title: Google CEO warns no firm is safe if AI bubble bursts

content:
LONDON: Alphabet chief executive Sundar Pichai said on Tuesday (Nov 18) that no company would be spared if the artificial intelligence investment boom collapses, as soaring valuations and massive spending fuel concerns of a bubble.

title: Use of artificial intelligence both praised and criticized at COP30 climate talks in Brazil
description: One expert calls AI an "completely unregulated beast around the world," while another calls it "so democratizing," but both sides agree AI is here to stay.
content:
BELEM, Brazil (AP) — At the U.N. climate talks in Brazil, artificial intelligence is being cast as both a hero worthy of praise and a villain that needs policing.
Tech companies and a handful of countries at the conference known as COP30 are promotin... [5622 chars]

title: CRTC updates definition of Canadian content, says AI doesn't count
description: OTTAWA — The federal broadcast regulator has released a new definition of Canadian content — and it says artificial intelligence can't qualify.
content:
OTTAWA — The federal broadcast regulator has released a new definition of Canadian content — and it says artificial intelligence can't qualify.

title: Microsoft partners with Anthropic and Nvidia in cloud infrastructure deal

title: Spokane County taps AI system to route non-emergency dispatch calls to free up 911 space
description: Spokane County is seeking the use of an artificial intelligence system that would triage non-emergent Crime Check calls to help dispatchers, Spokane Regional Emergency Communications announced Tuesday.
content:

title: What does 'agentic' AI mean? Tech's newest buzzword is marketing fluff
description: For technology adopters looking for the next big thing, “agentic AI” is the future. At least, that’s what the marketing pitches and tech industry T-shirts say. What makes an artificial intelligence product “agentic” depends on who’s selling it.
content:
